title: Blue Ridge Parkway: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Caution        Increased Bear Activity  Alert 1 , Severity ,caution ,, Increased Bear Activity  Bears are very active along the Parkway at this time. Learn how to stay safe in bear country! more     Information        Road Status  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Road Status  For road status updates, please check the real time road map.  Weather conditions along the Parkway vary and closures can change throughout the day. more
